# Plugins

Activation depends on the current project:

* [Apache Conf](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=mrmlnc.vscode-apache)
* [Azure Repos](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-vsts.team)
* [Base64 Utils](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=adrientoub.base64utils)
* [Debugger for Java](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=vscjava.vscode-java-debug)
* [Django](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=bigonesystems.django)
* [Django Snippets](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=bibhasdn.django-snippets)
* [Django Template](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=bibhasdn.django-html)
* [Hacker Stype Themes](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=wsds.theme-hacker)
* [Java Dependency Viewer](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=vscjava.vscode-java-dependency)
* [Java Extension Pack](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=vscjava.vscode-java-pack)
* [Java Test Runner](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=vscjava.vscode-java-test)
* [Maven for Java](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=vscjava.vscode-maven)
* [Python](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-python.python)
* [Settings Sync](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=Shan.code-settings-sync)
* [VSCode HackerTyper](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=jevakallio.vscode-hacker-typer)
* [XML Tools](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=DotJoshJohnson.xml)
* [Material Theme](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=Equinusocio.vsc-material-theme)
